description: Built a real-time pub/sub-messaging platform. Enables secure peer-to-peer data exchange using a decentralized blockchain network.
Leveraged blockchain for secure and immutable data storage. This ensures trust and transparency on the blockchain.
Integrated monitoring tools. Facilitates real-time visualization and performance monitoring of the blockchain network.
name: Connect Chain

description: Implemented a secure smart contract on Polygon Testnet for transparent and immutable transactions. This ensures trust and traceability by storing transaction history permanently on the blockchain, accessible to all participants.

Enhanced user experience by enabling interaction with Metamask wallet. This allows users to manage their funds securely and conveniently within the application, promoting a familiar and streamlined experience.
name: BlockPal

description: Developed scalable web scraping app. Supports paid and free tiers with rate limiting for scraping speed and concurrency.
Implemented tiered scraping plans. Paid users enjoy faster scraping capabilities compared to the free tier.
name: WebScrapper

description: A real-time chat application where users can communicate with each other.
React and JavaScript for building the user interface, Firebase provides the backend infrastructure and real-time data synchronization.
The app includes features such as user authentication, chat room creation, and messaging functionality
name: LogMessenger
